data.text: Ɗa la ɠɛ eɠɛ abui é sosu tiɠilekai ʋa,
Ni ɗa faa maayikia wolaiti kɛɛna,
Kaipa nu la dɛ ta mɛnini,
Gi pɛ gi ɠɛa ga kɔzɔba nuiti,
Nu nɔpɛ ge la mɔ ná, nii é wooɠulazu è ma,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ga gi-Ɠɛɛ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, mina yiiɠaawana gola,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa maaɠɛsu kpɔ naama vaa zuɠoloɠologiti kpein ma?
